Servus,

I'm a QM and I have to install some TestProcedures.
For some reasons UnitTests with JUnit are suitable.
But we are developin a distributet web-based System with our own
MiddleWareSystem. To test this it seems, that JUnit is the wron one. So I'm
looking for a mailinglist or a newsgroup that is dedicated for common
test-topics.

Please send me an email, if someone konws about such a group or list.

Thanx in advance

    Wolfgang Egger
subject: Testing-MailingList wanted
